input: Built gro_Grok_Template at F:\gro_Grok_Template: Conda env with Python 3.11.11, file structure (src/, config/, data/), agency-swarm installed, server.py for local POST/GET, GrokAgent for scraping, SummarizerAgent for summarization/pruning (10 MB limit). Key tasks: fixed imports, removed OpenAI API, handled invalid JSON, tested chat sync. Progress: sent full chat via chat_input.json, refining state.json updates. Current status: testing transfer process with control sample.
progress: Testing sync and control as of 2025-03-14
